how_to_order.question: How do I place an order?
how_to_order.answer:
To place an order:
1. Send any message to start
2. Click 'Order Menu'
3. Choose a category
4. Select items and quantities
5. Provide delivery address
6. Complete payment

It's that simple! 😊

minimum_order.question: What's the minimum order amount?
minimum_order.answer: Our minimum order amount is ₦1,000. This helps us maintain quality service and reasonable delivery costs. 📦

cancel_order.question: Can I cancel my order?
cancel_order.answer:
Yes! You can cancel your order:
• Before payment: Just click 'Cancel' during checkout
• After payment: Contact us immediately and we'll process a refund if the order hasn't been prepared yet. ⏰

modify_order.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
modify_order.answer:
Order modifications depend on timing:
• Before payment: Yes, you can add/remove items
• After payment but before preparation: Contact us immediately
• After preparation: Unfortunately, no changes possible 📝

payment_methods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment_methods.answer:
We accept all major payment methods through Paystack:
• Debit/Credit Cards (Visa, Mastercard, Verve)
• Bank Transfer
• USSD
• Mobile Money
• QR Code payments 💳

payment_security.question: Is my payment information secure?
payment_security.answer: Absolutely! We use Paystack, a PCI DSS compliant payment processor. Your card details are encrypted and never stored on our servers. Your security is our priority! 🔒

payment_failed.question: What if my payment fails?
payment_failed.answer:
If payment fails:
1. Check your card details and try again
2. Ensure sufficient funds are available
3. Contact your bank if issues persist
4. Try a different payment method

Need help? Just ask! 🤝

refund_policy.question: What's your refund policy?
refund_policy.answer:
Refunds are processed as follows:
• Order cancellation before preparation: Full refund within 3-5 business days
• Quality issues: Full refund or replacement
• Change of mind after delivery: No refund possible

Refunds go back to your original payment method 💰

delivery_time.question: How long does delivery take?
delivery_time.answer:
Delivery times vary by location:
• Within city center: 30-45 minutes
• Suburban areas: 45-60 minutes
• Remote areas: 60-90 minutes

We'll keep you updated on your order status! ⏱️

delivery_fee.question: How much is delivery?
delivery_fee.answer:
Delivery fees are calculated based on distance:
• Within 5km: ₦500
• 5-10km: ₦800
• 10-15km: ₦1,200
• Beyond 15km: Contact us for pricing

🎉 Free delivery on orders above ₦5,000!

delivery_areas.question: Do you deliver to my area?
delivery_areas.answer: We deliver across Lagos, Abuja, and Port Harcourt! If you're unsure about your area, share your location during checkout and we'll confirm availability. We're always expanding our coverage! 📍

track_order.question: Can I track my order?
track_order.answer:
Yes! You'll receive updates via WhatsApp:
• Order confirmed
• Preparation started
• Out for delivery
• Delivered

You can also contact us anytime for updates! 📱

menu_updates.question: How often is the menu updated?
menu_updates.answer:
Our menu is updated regularly:
• Daily specials added each morning
• Seasonal items change monthly
• New dishes introduced quarterly

Follow us for menu updates and special offers! 📋

ingredients.question: Can I know the ingredients in my food?
ingredients.answer: Absolutely! We're happy to share ingredient information for any dish. This is especially important for allergies and dietary restrictions. Just ask when ordering! 🥗

allergies.question: Do you cater to food allergies?
allergies.answer: Yes, we take allergies seriously! Please inform us of any allergies when ordering. We'll ensure your meal is prepared safely and can suggest suitable alternatives. Your safety matters! ⚠️

customization.question: Can I customize my order?
customization.answer:
Many items can be customized:
• Spice level (mild, medium, hot)
• Extra/less ingredients
• Side substitutions
• Special preparations

Just mention your preferences when ordering! 👨‍🍳

contact_support.question: How can I contact customer support?
contact_support.answer:
You can reach us through:
• This WhatsApp chat (fastest response)
• Phone: +234-XXX-XXX-XXXX
• Email: support@yourrestaurant.com

We're here to help 24/7! 📞

business_hours.question: What are your business hours?
business_hours.answer:
We're open:
• Monday - Sunday: 8:00 AM - 11:00 PM
• Kitchen closes at 10:30 PM
• Customer service available 24/7 via WhatsApp

We're here when you need us! 🕐

save_address.question: Will you save my delivery address?
save_address.answer: Yes! We automatically save your delivery address for faster future orders. You can always update it when placing new orders or ask us to change your saved address. 🏠

order_history.question: Can I see my order history?
order_history.answer: Currently, order history is managed internally. You can ask us about your previous orders anytime, and we'll provide the details. We're working on a customer portal for easy access! 📚
